xml.episodeInfo:
FUTURAMA
Episode 511
THREE HUNDRED BIG BOYS
Eric Kaplan Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. Caption: Voted "Best."
Planet Express: Meeting Room. The crew watch a television news program.
xml.speak: ON TV This week in the universe... Dateline Turantulon 6: The brave warriors of Earth under the command of General Major Weeblo Zapp Brannigan have achieved victory over the spider homeworld. And to the victor belong the spoils - one trillion dollars in silken treasure.
xml.info: Zapp strokes a silk suit.
xml.speak: ON TV Mmm!
xml.info: The scene changes to Nixon outside a building making an announcement.
xml.speak: ON TV My fellow Earthicans. After meeting with top voodoo economists, I have decided to refund our silk surplus to you, the taxpayers. That's right! I've sent you each 300 buckeroos in the form of a tricky dick fun bill. Knock yourselves out!
xml.info: The programs ends and the crew cheer.
xml.speak: I'm slightly richer!
What to do what to do? One $300 hookerbot or 300 $1 hookerbots?
I'm going to swim with the whale! They're the gentle giants of the deep.
I'm well aware of that.
Scruffy's gonna get himself one of them $300 haircuts. This ones lost it's pizazz!
A fortune it is! At last, Zoidberg will live like a rich man!
xml.info: He kisses the $300. Nixon squirms on it.
xml.speak: ON BILL Hey, cut it out! Go away! Get away from me!
Shmeesh! It's just 300 bucks, what is that, like a hundred cups of coffee?
That's it! I'm getting a hundred cups of coffee! Starting now. Coffee machine, one cup of coffee please.
xml.info: He puts the $300 into the machine and it takes $3 off, leaving him with $297.
xml.speak: ON BILL Smells good!
xml.info: Fry takes a sip of the coffee. His first. Zapp appears on the screen.
xml.speak: ON SCREEN Leela? Are you there?
No.

ON SCREEN Oh yes you are! I'm hereby inviting you and your oddball co-workers to a special reception to display the national silk surplus. I believe you know the heroic space stallion who captured it. Show them my medal Kif.
xml.info: Kif points at a medal on Zapp's chest.
xml.speak: ON SCREEN He rented it with his tax refund.
ON SCREEN So Leela, will you have the pleasure.
What little there is to be had.
ON SCREEN Tomorrow night at eight them. Smoochies!
xml.info: He kisses the screen.
Street. People wander around enjoying their $300. The 99c Store changes it's name to 299.99c Store and a crack addict wanders out of an alley kissing his money.
xml.speak: No cheap crack houses for me no more!
xml.info: Cut to: Outside Crack Mansion. The crack addict hands a man his $300.
xml.speak: Very good sir. Shall I pre-warm sir's crack pipe?
xml.info: Above the crack mansion a peddle-plane flies over.
Cut to: Peddle Plane. Amy and Kif are riding it. Kif is struggling.
xml.speak: Oh Kif, it was so romantic of you to rent this peddle plane with your tax rebate. We're like two dandelion seeds wafting on the breeze.
(GASPING) Yes...seeds...wafting.
I almost feel kinda shallow for blowing my rebate on this cool talking tattoo!
Hey Gordon Gecko! I cost as much as this whole crummy date!
Shut up! Ow!
xml.info: Geneworks. Farnsworth talks to a woman at a desk.
xml.speak: As a man it has become too much of a chore for me to clean out my wrinkles each day. Is it true that stem cells may fight the aging process?
Well yes, in the same way an infant may fight Muhammed Ali! But -
One pound of stem cells please.
xml.info: He slaps his $300 on the desk and the woman gives him a tub of stem cells.
xml.speak: Of course any age reversing effects will be purely temporary.
xml.info: She gags and turns away as Farnsworth slaps the stem cell cream on his face.

Hacking Jack's Fine Smokables. Bender peruses the fine merchandise within. He looks at some Dutch Butts for $1.99 but is more excited by the Royal Kooparillo for $300. He looks across at a cigar in a glass case, Le Grand Cigar, $10,000.
xml.speak: Say buddy, why's this grand cigar so pricy?

Well, as you can see, it's wrapper is a piece of the original US constitution. It was hand rolled by Queen Elizabeth during her wild years and was buried with George Burns until graverobbing space mushrooms - uh, well you know the rest.
Give me 300 bucks worth!
No can do.
Oh alright, I'll just take these $300 burglars tools then.
Very good sir.
So uh, what time d'you close tonight?
xml.info: Outside The Conrads' House. Dwight sits on the steps and smiles as Hermes arrives with a box behind his back.
xml.speak: Hey pops! Did that tax rebate come?
Came and went! You're now the proud owner of Bamboo Boogie Boots! With a warning label this big you know they gotta be fun!
But pops, I don't wanna have fun, I wanna be like you. Boring but prudently invested.
Babylon's bells! I tallyed almost 300 bananas on this entertainment product. Now you put 'em on and have fun!
(SHOUTING) I don't wanna.
Well then I'm gonna put 'em on and make you watch me have fun! See? Fun! Fun! Dwight! Help me!
I'll save you pops!
xml.info: He climbs the bamboo and hangs on to Hermes' feet. Hermes starts to lose his balance and he stumbles down the road still wearing the boots. Cars swerves to avoid him and honk their horns.
Outside Geneworks. Farnsworth comes out of the building looking younger. He sees a group of younger people standing around a car listening to loud music.
xml.speak: Hey! Turn that damn music......up!
xml.info: Hermes and Dwight stumble past on the bamboo boots.
xml.speak: Isn't this fun?
No! I wish I had two mommies!
xml.info: They walks past a jewellery shop called Diamonds Are Forever.
Diamonds Are Forever. Randy hands a cushion with jewellery on it to Zoidberg.
xml.speak: Try these, um, sir.
xml.info: Zoidberg puts the rings on his mouth flaps and looks at himself in the mirror.
xml.speak: I ask for rich guy stuff and you give me shiny pebbles? Bah! I bid you adieu!
xml.info: He shakes the rings off and they hit Randy on the head.
xml.speak: Ow!
xml.info: Zoidberg looks scared, woops and scuttles out.
Brooklyn Aquarium: Whale Tank. Leela is at a stand next to a whale tank.
xml.speak: I'd like a pass to swim with Mushu please.
Well you asked the right guy! I'm the whale biologist! Though personally I hate whales. (whispering) Espeically Mushu.
Then why'd you become a whale biologist?
I don't know you well enough to get into that. $300 please. Noon tomorrow. If you're late you only get to tread water in the scallop tank.
xml.info: Leela takes her pass and leaves.
Cut to: Brooklyn Aquarium: Starfishbucks Coffee. Fry waits in line for a cup of coffee.
xml.speak: Uh, I'll have a coffee.
Guppy, trout, mermaid or -
Whale please.
xml.info: The man pours the coffee and Fry drinks it.
Peddle Plane. Amy and Kif fly over the Aquarium.
xml.speak: (GASPING) Amy, I-I also spent some of my tax rebate on a gift for you.
Oh Kiffie!
xml.info: She opens the box. It is a watch with two faces.
xml.speak: It shows the time wherever we both are. And it's powered by love! Also you have to wind it.
Ohh! Somebody won big at Skeeball!
You shut up! I love it Kif. I'll use it whenever I wanna know what time it is. Ooo! It's Fry and Leela! (shouting) Hi Fry and Leela!
xml.info: The paddle plane lurches forward and starts falling. Kif screams.
xml.speak: Oh! Keep peddling! Oh for the love of God keep peddling!
xml.info: Cut to: Fry and Leela. Leela screams and Fry gurgles his coffee.

Cut to: Peddle Plane. They get closer and closer to the ground. The plane turns the right way right at the last minute and swoops over people's heads. They scream. The peddle plane flies over Mushu's tank. Kif wipes his brow and breathes a sigh of relief. Amy leans over backwards again and waves.
xml.speak: (SHOUTING) Bye Fry and Leela!
xml.info: The peddle plane tilts sideways and the watch starts to slide of the front of it. Kif panics. The watch slips off and he sighs. Mushu leaps up out of the water and eats the watch. The crowd applauds.
xml.speak: Oh I can't wait until the tattoos on Amy's butt hear about this!
Hear about what? Tell us!
xml.info: A horse tattoo neighs.
Planet Express: Meeting Room. Kif cries.
xml.speak: Don't feel sad my little tadpole.
(CRYING) I'm trying not to. But my gift to you is in the belly of a whale.
Say, this reminds me of that time I ate that other watch Kif gave you!
Hey, it is kinda like that!
To induce vomitting, that was the solution! Everywhere it went! What a Valentine's Day that was!
xml.info: Leela looks at her Mushu pass.
xml.speak: Hmm, this may seem like a huge coincidence but I happen to have it in with that whale!
Scruffy's formulated a plan. But you'll need a ready source of nausiatin' rotten fish.
xml.info: Elzar's Fine Cuisine. In the restaurant Fry, Leela, Kif and Amy sit around a table with a huge fish in the middle. Enter Elzar.
xml.speak: Freshen your coffee sir?
Yeah yeah yeah keep it comin' put the pot down get away!
xml.info: He drinks the coffee. His 31st cup. Leela gets up and goes somewhere. Elsewhere in the restaurant Farnsworth is having dinner with the woman from earlier.
xml.speak: You're so young in spirit! Its hard to believe you're as old as 25.
The key is to grab life by the hojos! Live every day like it might be your last!
What'll it be kids?
One bowl of mild verena.
xml.info: Cut to: Elzar's Kitchen. Enter Leela. She opens the fresh fish freezer door and looks inside.
xml.speak: Pay dirt! Heyya!
xml.info: Cut to: Restaurant. Leela casually strolls out of the kitchen whistling. And sits down. Elzar serves food to Zoidberg.
xml.speak: Here you go big spender: Foie gras and caviar!
xml.info: Zoidberg sniffs the food.
xml.speak: Goose liver? Fish eggs? Pah! Where's the goose? Where's the fish?
Hey, that's what rich people eat. The garbage parts of the food.
I ate garbage yesterday and it didn't cost me $300! I'm not paying. Farewell good sir!
xml.info: He leaves with a very upper-class scuttle and woop.
Outside Hacking Jack's Fine Smokables. On the roof Bender shines a torch onto a grate. He cuts it open and starts to lower himself through it.

Cut to: Hacking Jack's Fine Smokables. Bender lowers himself from the roof a la Tom Cruise in Mission: Impossible and stops just above the case containing the $10,000 cigar. He gets a diamond out of his chest cavity and cuts through the glass with it then throws the diamond in the bin. He reaches in and takes out the cigar.
xml.speak: Le Grand Cigar! She's mine! And with absolutely no consequences!
xml.info: He evily cackles and raises himself out of the room. In the corner a security camera watches him. The signal goes along a wire, down a dark tunnel, through the sewers where El Chupanibre terrorises the leg mutant, up a pole and through a dark hole.
Cut to: Police Station. Smitty watches what's going on on URL's chest.
xml.speak: You see that?
Grand theft tobacco. Sounds like we should get off our fat cop asses and ride!
xml.info: The siren comes out of his head.

Outside Elzar's Fine Cuisine. The next morning Hermes and Dwight are still walking around on the bamboo boots but now they are asleep. Elzar comes out the back door of the restaurant with a crate of fish.
xml.speak: Pee-yew! This fish is slightly too rotten to even make jambolaya!
xml.info: He pours the fish into a dumpster and leaves. The dumpster lid swings open and Leela and Amy climb out with the fish in a net.
xml.speak: (WHISPERING) So far so good. Where's Kif?
xml.info: Behind them Kif groans as he is dragged along inside the net.
Guadalajara Brown Drip Gourment Coffee. Fry is jittery as he has an early morning cup of coffee. He drinks his 51st cup.
xml.speak: (SHOUTING) This isn't Yemeni! It's Sulowesi! And the cup's shaking I don't want my coffee shaking!
You seem a tad wound up buddy. And your face is greasy! Real greasy. You been up all night?
Of course I've been up all night! Not because of caffine it was insomnia I couldn't stop thinking about coffee I need a nap. Coffee time!
xml.info: He gulps down his 52nd cup. Bender gets out his cigar and sniffs it.
xml.speak: Ah! Mighty fine smokable!
Fancy cigar why don't you smoke it already? Puff puff go go go go go!
Nah, you can't blow smoke from such a majestic stogy in just anyone's face. I'm saving it for the fancy pants at Zapp Brannigan's black tie reception. You comin'?
xml.info: Fry nods jitterily.
Brooklyn Aquarium: Whale Tank. Leela is kitted out in a swimming costume and flippers. The rotten fish is packed into her costume.
xml.speak: And the fifth reason whales kill is for the sheer fun of it.
Anything else?
Yeah. You're lumpy and you smell awful. Hey, I calls 'em like I sees 'em! I'm a whale biologist.
xml.info: Leela turns to the tank.
xml.speak: OK Mushu, its feeding time! Oh crud, he ate my suit!
The suit was ugly - whale biologist!
xml.info: Golf Club. Zoidberg swings at the ball but repeatedly misses.
xml.speak: Perhaps if you tightened your grip sir?
Ah. Thank you golf slave! Bah! Rich pople wouldn't waste their time on this nonsense! Plus, these eggs are gritty and tasteless!
xml.info: He spits out three golf balls and whacks them with the half club.
Cut to: Picnic Site. Farnsworth and the woman are kissing. One of Zoidberg's balls hits Farnsworth on the head.
xml.speak: Ow! Not so rough!
xml.info: Brooklyn Aquarium: Whale Tank. The show has started and the stands are full of people. Kif, Amy and Bender are already there. Leela arrives wrapped in the Please Do Not Feed The Whale sign and gives the thumbs up. The orphans sit in front of them.
xml.speak: Ladies and gentlemen, presenting Mushu! The educated whale who thinks he's better than you!
xml.info: The crowd cheers.
xml.speak: C'mon Mushu! Barf! Barf like a freshman!
And now ignorant whale lovers, we'll see who's boss as I make Mushu jump through this hoop. Jump Mushu! Who wants a fish?
xml.info: Mushu throws up and the crowd gasps.
xml.speak: Mushu is sick!
xml.info: Smity and URL stand aghast as Bender sneaks out behind them.
xml.speak: It just keep comin' and comin'!
Wait, that chunk, its the watch! I got it Amy! I got it! The plan went off without a -
He's got Aquarium property! Stop him!
Better do what he says. He's a whale biologist!
xml.info: He lifts Kif out of the water.
xml.speak: You're under arrest you squishy punk!
xml.info: Smitty puts the cuffs on Kif and he drops the watch. He sighs. Mushu sicks up Leela's swimming costume.
Outside Silk Surplus Reception. Two people walk inside. Two hobos try to follow them but a forcefield stops them and the fall over.
Cut to: Silk Surplus Reception. Zapp tells his story to Mom and her sons and Mayor Poopenmeyer.
xml.speak: The Spiderians, though weak and woman-like on the battlefield, are masters of the textile arts. Taste like king crab by the way. Crazy bugs actually wove this tapestry of my heroic conquest while I was still killing them!
xml.info: Zoidberg scratches the tapestry and sniffs it.
xml.speak: What? It's not even scratch and sniff? But if rich people think it's good, I'll buy it! One art please!
xml.info: Mom laughs.
xml.speak: What a clever impersonation of a stupid poor person! How much is that placemat actually worth Brannigan?
Exactly $1 billion!
Now that's walkin' around money!
xml.info: She blows her nose on her $300.
xml.speak: ON BILL What? Hey! Wait! Arooo!
xml.info: Zoidberg looks on sadly. Over on the other side of the room an even jitterier Fry just about manages to pour himself another cup of coffee. He drinks his 99th cup. Bender "enjoys" a conversation with Judge Whitey.
xml.speak: So I said to Kitty "The only way to keep the butler from running away is to cut off his foot!" Yes, it reminds me of a joke I heard about upper-middle class people.
xml.info: Bender blows smoke in his face and he coughs. Elsewhere Amy and Scruffy talk.
xml.speak: (CRYING) I've never been sad at a party before. I wonder if my mind is thinking about Kif being in jail.
Jail's not so bad. You can make sangria in the terlet! Course its shank or beshanked.
(CRYING) Of course.
xml.info: Commander Riker Prison. Kif paces around in his cell still covered in the whale sick.
xml.speak: Look, just give back the property and we'll drop the charges.
Fine, have the watch. It's broken anyway.
xml.info: He throws the watch but a forcefield stops it from going through the bars and it bounces back and hits him on the head.
xml.speak: I don't want your watch. You're covered in precious ambergris.
Precious ambergris?
xml.info: The whale biologist sighs and presses a button on his belt. A holographic image of Roseanne appears.
xml.speak: Ambergris. Noun. A grease-like product of the sperm whale's digestive tract that is used as a base in the finest perfumes. This has been Roseanne, your guide to the world of facts.
xml.info: The holo-encyclopedia shuts off.
xml.speak: You heard Roseanne. Scrape off the priceless ambergris and I'll let you go!
Or better yet I'll simply shed my skin!
xml.info: He struggles as he takes it off.
Silk Surplus Reception. Morbo's wife fiddles with his bow tie.
xml.speak: Stop it! Stop it! It's fine! I will destroy you!
xml.info: Bender walks past and blows smoke in their faces. They cough. Underneath a giant spider dress Farnsworth and his girlfriend make out. A bell tolls.
xml.speak: Wha? Uh, gotta go, uh fight club!
xml.info: He runs out from underneath the dress and covers his face. His girlfriend follows.
xml.speak: What's happening Hubie?
I'm afraid the face you fell in love with was actually just a blob of living gunk I bought with my tax refund.
xml.info: The stem cells slide away.
xml.speak: Well as long as we're being honest, I also spent my tax refund on a crazy treatment.
xml.info: She pulls a plug out of her belly button and she swells up. She is really a huge fat woman.
xml.speak: That certainly is honest.
It better for us both to just be ourselves. You, wrinkled as a prune.
You, fat as the Queen of Seacows.
I love you!
xml.info: They kiss and she falls on him.
xml.speak: Oh my!
xml.info: On the other side of the room Leela is now talking to Whitey and Kif is reunited with Amy.
xml.speak: So you see the putrid waxy substance I was coated with was -
Not precious ambergris?
Yes! And I managed to sneak some out in a usual place! Ta-da! Using that, I'll make you a perfume of lilac and jasmine and frankenberry!
Oh Kif, it's so romantic I can't even wait! I'm gonna wear it right now!
xml.info: She puts some on. Her tattoo splutters. Everyone else chokes at he stench.
xml.speak: Who smells like freaking porpus hork?
I do! Kiss me Kif!
xml.info: They kiss. Zoidberg slinks out sadly.
Cut to: Outside Silk Surplus Reception. Zoidberg walks out through the fire exit and sits on a dustbin.
xml.speak: (CRYING) Oh what a foolish squid I've been. I'm not rich! I can't even buy one measley masterpiece!
xml.info: He cries. The hobos approach him.
xml.speak: Pardon us gent. Might a couple of hungry hungry hobos take a feed from that aluminium snack box?
xml.info: Zoidberg gets off the bin and the hobos rummage through it.
xml.speak: So now I'm in the gutter? Surrounded by bums who eat garbage. Money brought me no happiness. Bupkiss!
Ooo this boot's got a little pudding at the bottom!
xml.info: He licks it off.
Silk Surplus Reception. Bender and Leela talk to Ben Beeler.
xml.speak: Interestingly, the Spiderians are more closely related to our elephants than our spiders.
xml.info: Bender blows smoke inhis face and he coughs. Bender chuckles then gasps as Hermes and Dwight enter via the window, still walking around on the bamboo boots.
xml.speak: (SHOUTING) Don't mind us!
xml.info: The start to go off balance and one of the bamboo legs knocks Bender's cigar out of his hand. It spins through the air and sets fire to the tapestry. Other things catch on fire too.
xml.speak: The loot! The loot! The loot is on fire!
Leela! My precious rock tub! I'll save you!
xml.info: He runs towards her but gets caught in a Spiderian web.
xml.speak: Everyone! To the fire door!
It's on fire!
We're trapped my sweet hippopotamus!
xml.info: Amid the chaos Fry still finds time for a drink.
xml.speak: Coffee coffee coffee coffee coffee coffee coffee coffee coffee coffee!
xml.info: He drinks the rest of the jug and his heartbeat rapidly increases. It's his hundredth cup. He enters a slowed down bullet-time world � la The Matrix. He gazes around the room. A champagne cork slowly shoots out the top of a bottle. Outside, a hummingbird's wings beat slowly � la the hummingbird in Star Trek: Insurrection. Fry blows out the fire that has engulfed Leela's shoe, picks her up and carries her away. Hermes and Dwight are in mid-fall. Fry picks them up, throws them over his shoulder and carries them out. He carries a few more people out. Kif is slowly blowing out the fire on Bender's burning arm. Fry squeezes his cheeks and the flames go away. He puts Bender, Kif and Amy onto the sofa with everyone else and wheels it out into the alley through the fire door. He picks up a fire extinguisher and quickly puts out the flames.
Cut to: Outside Silk Surplus Reception. Everyone looks around, wondering where they are.
xml.speak: Where are we pops?
What happened to the food?
I think we were saved by a mysterious orange blur.
Welcome one and all. I finally figured out how money could make me happy! By using it to buy my hungry friends a feast!
xml.info: Behind him the hobos cheer.
xml.speak: Everyone join us. Oysters rockafeller here has provided genuine turkey dogs!
Heck, you're never too rich to enjoy a free turkey dog!
xml.info: The rich people cheer.
xml.speak: I'll take four!
Me too!
Oh what the hell!
xml.info: Everyone sits down and eats. Zoidberg puts a pack of Gobble Wieners on a barbecue.
xml.speak: Here Dwight, $299 and 99 cents. You invest this penny like you want it.
Thanks Dad. I'm gonna take this and buy five shares of amazon.com!
A risk taker? That's my boy!
xml.info: Poopenmeyer walks out of the building carrying Nixon's head.
xml.speak: The entire surplus has gone! What a muguvern I've been! Why did I have to issue that crooked tax rebate?
At least we got a few mildly interesting stories out of it.
Oh my yes!
Speaking of which, my story kinda peetered out without me learning a lesson!
xml.info: He laughs. Enter Smitty and URL.
xml.speak: There he is!
xml.info: Bender panics. They grab him and bash him with their lightsabers.
xml.speak: All right! Closure!
xml.info: THE END
